T02TD1347.2E:160a-5: de ltar tshes gcig la sogs pa'i cha lnga lnga bo nam mkha' dang rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i rang bzhin dga' ba dang bzang po dang rgyal ba dang stong pa dang rdzogs pa'i ming can aa ai ri au li ka / aa ae aar ao aa la tsa //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-6: ha ya ra wa la ta ces pa'i dbyangs 'di dag gi chos can rnams kyis te de ltar lnga pa ni dga' ba rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-7: bcu pa ni mchog dga' rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-8: nya ni khyad par gyi dga' ba rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-9: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes pa ni cha bcu drug pa ste khams thams cad bsdus pa dang tshogs pa dang 'dus pa dang sngom pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-10: de ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi chags pa ni dkar po'i phyogs te chags bral ni nag po'i phyogs so //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-11: de bzhin du mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:160a-12: chags bral dang po chags pa che //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-14: rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i gnas //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-15: sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa zhes pa dang de bzhin du /
T02TD1347.2E:160a-16: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-17: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-18: cha med cha las 'das pa po //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-19: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang //
T02TD1347.2E:160a-20: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-0: de ltar don dam pas le'u lnga pa las phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes rgya cher brjod par bya ste des na 'dir @160b rgyas par ma byas so //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-1: da ni 'dod pa zhes pa la sogs pas dga' ba bcu drug po rnams kyi sbyor ba bzhi gsungs pa 'dir sems can thams cad kyi sad pa dang rmi lam dang shin tu gnyid log pa dang bzhi pa'i dbye bas sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi sbyor ba ste de dag kyang dga' ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas bcu drug go //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-2: de la 'dod pa zhes pa ni sku'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-3: dga' ba zhes pa ni gsung gi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-4: 'dar ba zhes pa ni thugs kyi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-5: 'gyur med ces pa'i ming gis ye shes kyi dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-6: de ltar bzhi po yis dga' ba'i sbyor ba gcig go //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-7: de bzhin du gang ba zhes pa ni sku'i mchog dga'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-8: 'dir mchog gi dga' ba la sogs pa gsum po rnams mtha' ma dang por byas nas gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnams te sdeb sbyor gyi dbang gis so //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-9: de'i phyir mchog gi dga' ba ni zhes pa gsung gi mchog dga'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-10: skye ba zhes pa ni thugs kyi mchog dga'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-11: nus pa zhes pa ni ye shes kyi mchog dga' ste gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-12: 'bar ba zhes pa ni sku'i khyad par dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-13: khyad par dga' ba zhes pa ni gsung gi khyad par dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-14: gnyid yur zhes pa ni thugs kyi khyad par dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-15: thig le zhes pa ni ye shes kyi khyad par dga' ba ste gsum pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-16: de bzhin du aodda zhes pa ni sku'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-17: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba zhes pa ni gsung gi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-18: gnyid ces pa ni thugs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-19: n'a da zhes pa ni ye shes kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-20: de bzhin du sprul pa dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang chos dang ngo bo nyid kyi dbye bas sku rnam pa bzhi dang de bzhin du gsung rnam pa bzhi dang thugs rnam pa bzhi dang ye shes rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-21: de bzhin du dga' ba bcu drug gi dbye ba ni 'chad par 'gyur pa las rgya cher brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-22: bcu drug gi mthar lhan cig skyes pa'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:160b-23: da ni sems kyi zhes pa la sogs pas las kyi phyag rgya'i rnam par dag pa gsungs pa 'dir rgyud thams cad las ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams thun mong gis gsungs te rnal 'byor pa rnam rjes su chags pa byed pa'i slad du'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-0: @161a * // de yang byang chub kyi sems brtan par byas pa rnams kyi yin gyi gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin no //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-1: gzhan rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang ldan pa'i bud med gnas skabs kyi dbye bas ma la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-2: 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa bud med la sems par byed na de'i tshe sems kyi bsam pa byas pas mar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-4: rdo rje zhugs pas bu mor 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-5: byed pa dang bcas shin tu dga' bas sring mo'i bu mo nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-6: thig le lhung bar gyur na chung ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-7: gzhan gyi rigs la gnas pa gtum mo'i rnal 'byor mar ni 'dod chags nyams par gyur pa las te chags bral las 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-8: 'di rnams rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ste rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-10: de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams rnams 'khrug ste 'khrug pa rnams 'dzag go //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-11: de'i phyir sa chu bsreg za rlung dang mkha' dang chad pa'i dngos rnams te gnas skabs drug go //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-12: de bzhin du g-yas dang g-yon gyi dkyil 'khor lnga zad pa yang 'pho pa'i dus su rig par bya ste ma la sogs pa rnam par dag pas so //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-13: 'khor lo dang rna cha dang mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dang ske rags dang thal ba rnam par dag pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams te de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug rnam par dag pas so zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-14: da ni chu skyes zhes pa la sogs pas sku la sogs pa'i phyag rgya gsum gsungs te 'dir rgyud thams cad las phyi rol du drang ba'i don gyis dpral bar sku'i phyag rgya dang mgrin par gsung gi phyag rgya dang snying khar thugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-15: nges pa'i don gyis kyang chu skyes la ni rdo rje rab zhugs te rdo rje rtag tu langs pa ni sku'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-16: rtse mo can la rlung dang zhes pa rtsa dbu ma la srog gi rlung rab tu zhugs pa gsung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-17: thig le mi ltung ba ni thugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161a-18: 'di rnams rnal 'byor gsum gyi ste dbu ma la rten pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya rnams su grangs bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-0: de'i steng du chags dang chags bral mthar @161b gyur dang po zhes pa la chags pa ni dkar po'i phyogs te de'i mthar gyur pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-1: chags bral ni nag po'i phyogs te de'i dang po'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-2: de ltar chags dang chags bral mthar gyur dang po ni cha bcu drug par gnas pa ste ji srid mi 'dzag pa de srid du de ni mtha' dag yon tan gyi gter 'gyur pa med pa'i bde ba sbyin pa po rnal 'byor rnams kyis rtogs bya bzhi pa'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yan lag drug gi sbyor ba kho nas rtogs par bya ba ste gzhan rnams kyis ni ma yin no //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-3: phyag rgya rnams las te snga ma dang phyi ma dgu po rnams las de ni legs pa'i ma skyed byed mar mngal nas skyes pa'i dus nas brtsams te 'chi ba'i mthar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-4: rnam bcu ni du ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas spyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal 'di'o zhes pa ni ye shes kyi zhal bzhi pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-5: de ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i chos can no zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-6: de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba'i don du phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rab tu bstan nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i slad du bla mas nges pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-7: de la rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi lha mo rnams spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:161b-8: de nas nyin mo'i dus su gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma bcu la'o thug la sogs pa mngar ba'i zas kyis ston mo byas te yon phul nas gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-9: de nas chu tshod bdun pa la dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mngar ba'i kha zas sha dang bral ba rnams kyis yang dag par mchod cing sangs rgyas gtso bor byas nas dge 'dun la yon phul te 'phags pa'i dge 'dun chen po gtsug lag khang du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:161b-10: de nas skye bo dang bral ba'i khyim bug pa med par tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs dpa' bo dang dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma rnams kyi gnas rnams bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-0: 'dir 'byor ba dang rjes su mthun pas gtso bo bla ma shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid ni dbus dang phyogs bzhi'i char rnal 'byor ma bzhi rnams te dbus su g-yung mo dang shar du dmangs rigs mo dang lhor rgyal rigs mo dang byang du bram ze mo dang nub tu rje rigs ma ste tshogs kyi gtso bo lnga'i @162a * //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-2: 'di rnams kyi gdan ni mi'i pags pa dang khyi'i pags pa dang rta'i pags pa dang ba lang gi pags pa dang glang po che'i pags pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-3: de nas gnyis pa ni phyogs bral rnams su ste dbang ldan du gci ba'i snod dang rlung du bshang pa'i snod dang bden bral du khrag gi snod dang mer rkang gi snod do //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-4: de nas zlum skor gnyis pa thugs kyi 'khor lo'i gnas la shar du 'khar ba mkhan mo dang lhor 'od ma'i gar mkhan mo dang byang du nor bu mkhan ma dang nub tu khron pa mkhan ma dang mer thags mkhan ma dang bden bral du chang 'tshong ma dang dbang ldan du gser mkhan ma dang rlung du phreng ba mkhan ma ste rnal 'byor ma brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-5: 'di rnams kyi gdan rnams ni grangs bzhin du lug gi pags pa dang 'brog dgon pa'i khyi'i pags pa dang rnga mo'i pags pa dang 'dam seng gi pags pa dang ra'i pags pa dang ri dags kyi pags pa dang bong bu'i pags pa dang phag gi pags pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-6: de nas zlum skor gsum pa gsung gi 'khor lo'i gnas la shar du sha 'tshong ma dang mer rdza mkhan ma dang lhor 'khur ba mkhan ma dang bden bral du smad 'tshong ma dang nub tu tshem bu ma dang rlung du nya pa mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-7: byang du gar mkhan ma dang dbang ldan du btso blag mkhan ma ste rnal 'byor ma brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-8: 'di rnams kyi gdan rnams ni kum bh'i ra'i pags pa dang 'gron bu'i phung po dang karka ta'i rus pa'i phung po dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-10: ma ka ra'i pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-12: rus sbal gyi khog pa dang dung rnams grangs bzhin no //
T02TD1347.2E:162a-13: de nas zlum skor bzhi pa sku'i 'khor lo'i gnas la shar du lcags mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-14: lhor rgya skyegs mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-15: nub tu srin bal mkhan ma dang ;
T02TD1347.2E:162a-16: byang du til mar mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-17: mer smyug ma mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-18: bden bral du shing mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-19: rlung du ko lpags mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162a-20: dbang ldan du 'dreg mkhan ma ste brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-0: 'di rnams kyi gdan rnams ni bse'i @162b pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-5: ce spyang gi pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-7: byi la'i pags pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-8: de nas zlum skor lnga pa dur khrod kyi gnas la /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-9: shar du kla klo ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-12: byang du stag gzig ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-14: bden bral du ro sreg ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-15: rlung du bhi ll'i dang dbang ldan du ri khrod ma ste rab gtum ma brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-16: 'di rnams kyi gdan rnams ni go dh'a'i pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-18: s'a la dz'a ta ka'i pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-20: ri bong gi pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-21: gzungs mo byi dur gyi pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-22: a'i shu ka pa shu'i pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-23: rtsangs pa'i pags pa rnams so ;
T02TD1347.2E:162b-24: / pags pa 'di rnams med na shar dang mer khyi'i pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-25: lho dang bden bral du rta'i pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-26: nub dang rlung du glang po'i pags pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-27: byang dang dbang ldan du ba lang gi pags pa ste dbus su mi'i pags pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-28: de ltar gdan rnams bkod nas rnal 'byor ma rnams bzhugs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-29: pags pa 'di rnams kyi sder sbyin par bya ste de bzhin du skyogs rnams ni shar du nya phyis kyi snod de me ru yang de bzhin no //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-30: lho dang bden bral du n'a ri ke la'i skyogs dang nub dang rlung du kham phor dang byang dang dbang ldan du mi'i thod pa dang dbus su shing gi snod do //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-31: de nas chang la sogs pa phul nas bza' ba dang bca' ba la sogs pa sgron ma dang bcas pa 'chang bar 'gyur pa chu dang mchod yon la sogs pa rnam pa bcu po phul te mandala byas nas /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-32: slob mas las kyi rdo rje can dang lhan cig tu mchod pa'i rdzas dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-33: de ltar na tshogs kyi 'khor lo la gnas dang rigs nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:162b-34: de nas le'u lnga pa las gsungs pa'i tshogs /
T02TD1347.2E:162b-35: kun du spyod pa dang 'khrig pa yang bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-0: kun du spyod pa de la shes rab yum gyi nang nas tshogs kyi gtso mo de ni mchog @163a * //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-1: gi yum zhes pa ste g-yung mo dang gtum mo'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-2: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la thams cad du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi spyan ma la sogs pa bzhi'i ni sring mo'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-3: sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug dang sngon mo dang drag spyan ma gnyis ni sring mo'i bu mo rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-4: phyugs kyi skye bo 'jigs ster tsartsi k'a sogs brgyad ni yang tsha mo'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-5: 'di rnams ni 'khor lo la gnas pa dus kun tu ni kun tu spyod pas gnas pa rang rigs sa la gnas pa rnams te /
T02TD1347.2E:163a-6: rnal 'byor pa yis bsten par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-7: gnas dang zhing dang 'dus pa dang dur khrod de sa bcu gnyis la gnas pa rnams bsten par bya zhing skye bo dang bcas pa grong gi dbus dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang phyi rol skye bo med par nam yang dor bar mi bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-8: gcer bu gos dang bral zhing skra grol ba lag na gri gug dang thod pa can de rnams thams cad yang dag par rgyu'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-9: de bzhin du dpal ldan rdo rje can ni slob dpon te g-yung po'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-10: dpal ldan yab de nyid ni gtum po ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163a-11: gtso bo nyid kyi phyir dang g-yung mo dang gtum mo'i lhag ma zab dang de dang 'khrig pa byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-12: de ltar rigs rnam par dag pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rang gi ma la sogs pa dang rigs las skyes pa rang gi sar 'ongs pa rnams dor bar mi bya zhing de la ngo tsha bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-13: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dpal ldan rdo rje can ni dpal ldan yab ste srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-14: sangs rgyas thams cad ming po ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163a-15: dmangs rigs la sogs pa dang 'phyag pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-16: mig la sogs pa rnams ni tsha bo ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163a-17: 'khar ba mkhan la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-18: yang tsha rnams ni brgyad de shan pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-19: yang tsha'i bu ni lcags mkhan la sogs pa rnams te /
T02TD1347.2E:163a-20: skye bo dang bcas pa dang skye bo med par rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dor bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163a-21: phan tshun sems rnam par dag pa'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-0: tshogs kyi 'khor lo de la bud med zla ba'i bzhin dang autpala mig can mchog gi dri yis rjes su byugs @163b pa gang su dag / bsod nams ngag gi rgyu ru dag pa gsum gyis slob dpon dpa' bo dang bcas pa la rdo rje'i mchod par 'bul byed na //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-1: sa gzhi sbyin dang glang po rta dang shing rta du ma'i bu mo rab tu sbyin las bsod nams gang zhig 'gyur pa'i bsod nams de rnams thams cad rnal 'byor ma de la 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-2: mi bdag ces pa ni bod pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-3: mkhar gnas zla ba nyi ma'i mtshams su ste mi zad par zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-4: da ni sgrol ma zhes pa la sogs pas dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i rigs rnams sgrol ma la sogs pa'i rigs rnams su gsungs te ;
T02TD1347.2E:163b-5: mi'i 'jig rten 'dir las kyi rjes su mthun pas rigs so //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-6: de la dmangs rigs rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-7: sa gzhi rmo ba dang ba lang skyong ba dang 'jim pa'i las byed pa dang khyim la sogs pa'i gnas byed pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-8: de ltar na sgrol ma dmangs mo rnam pa bzhi rus yi steng du 'gyur ro ;
T02TD1347.2E:163b-9: / gos dkar mo ni rgyal rigs rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-10: rgyal rigs kyi chos kyis rkang thang dang rta la zhon pa dang glang po che la zhon pa dang shing rta la zhon pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-11: sa ste spyan ma ni rje rigs ma rnams te rje rigs kyi chos las rnam pa gsum ni tshong pa dang yig mkhan dang sman pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-12: m'a ma k'i ni gnyis skyes skye bo'i rigs skyes bram ze mo ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-13: gnyis skyes kyi chos las rnam pa bdun ni nges brjod kyi yal ga dang mchod sbyin gyi yal ga dang snyan ngag gi yal ga dang srid srung gi yal ga dang nags na rab tu gnas pa'i chung ma dang bdag po'i chung ma dang grol ba'i chung ma ste rnam pa bdun no //
T02TD1347.2E:163b-14: de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma ni 'khar ba mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-15: ro rdo rje ma ni chang 'tshong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-16: gzugs rdo rje ma ni gser mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-17: dri rdo rje ma ni phreng ba mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-18: reg bya rdo rje ma ni thags mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-19: chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ni nor bu mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-20: drag spyan ma ni khron pa mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-21: shin tu sngon mo ni 'od ma'i gar mkhan ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-23: de bzhin du ts'a mund'a ni sha 'tshong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-24: khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:163b-25: phag mo ni 'khur ba mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-2: dbang mo ni tshem bu ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-3: tshangs ma ni nya pa ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-4: drag mo ni gar mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-5: dpal mo ni btso blag mkhan ma ste brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-6: de bzhin du rmugs byed ma ni rgya skyegs mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-7: rengs byed ma ni srin bal mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-8: khengs ma ni til mar mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-9: shin tu stobs ma ni lcags mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-10: 'od zer can ni ko lpags mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-11: khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-12: tsun d'a ni 'dregs mkhan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-13: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ni smyug ma mkhan ma ste brgyad ni khro bo'i rigs can rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-14: khyi gdong ma ni kla klo ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-15: phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-16: ce spyang gdong ma ni gtum mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-17: stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-18: bya rog gdong ma ni bsnyon thabs ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-19: bya rgod gdong ma ni ro sreg ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-20: mkha' lding gdong ma ni bhi ll'i dang /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-21: 'ug gdong ma ni ri khrod ma ste brgyad ni rab gtum ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-22: de ltar na sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa gzhi'i gnas su rnal 'byor rnams dag gi rigs rnams te /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-23: zhing dang gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang yul dang grong mchog dpal ldan nags su yang dag gnas rnams kyis //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-24: rmongs pa rnams ni 'ching bar byed cing rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor rnams la dngos grub ste zhes pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-25: slar yang 'di rnams kyi dbye ba ni bzhi ni dmangs rigs mo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-26: drug ni sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-27: de bzhin brgyad ni tsartsi k'a la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-28: bcu ni khro bo'i dbye ba rnams te /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-29: de dag las gnyis ni sgra la sogs pa rnams la rab tu zhugs so //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-30: nor ni brgyad kyi dbye ba ste /
T02TD1347.2E:164a-31: khyi gdong ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-32: de bzhin du bzhi ni sangs rgyas kyi dbye ba rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-33: drug ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbye ba rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-34: yi dags rnams ni brgyad kyi dbye ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164a-36: lha min rnams ni brgyad kyi dbye ba ste /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-0: gdengs can srid par gnas rnams zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi @164b dbye ba sum cu rtsa drug ste rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-1: gcig pu gcig ni sna tshogs gtso bo ste /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-2: srid gsum gnas su dpal ldan rigs rnams dag gi khyab byed de sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-3: de bzhin du sa 'og rnams su gtum mo brgyad de khyi gdong ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-4: mi yi 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor la ni khro skyes rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-5: yi dags zhes bya brgyad ni yi dags 'jig rten du ste /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-6: lhag mchog gnas su sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug ces pa ni 'dod pa spyod pa drug go //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-7: tshangs pa'i yul sar dpal ldan bzhi ste /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-8: tshangs ris la sogs pa'i gzugs can zad par sa la sogs pa bsgoms pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-9: gzugs med pa rnams ni stong pa'i khams so //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-10: rab mchog zhi ba'i grong du yum gcig ma ni ye shes kyi khams te /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-12: 'di rnams rab tu khros pa'i zhal rnams kyis sna tshogs te /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-13: lus yang dag sdud byed dgyes pa rnams kyis ni skyong bar byed pa nyid do zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma'i rigs nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:164b-14: da ni bu mo zhes pa la sogs pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi don du rdo rje mchod pa'i nges pa gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-15: 'dir dben par tshogs kyi 'khor lo'am skye bo med par bsgom pa'i dus su bu mo rgan mo dar ma rnams sam /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-16: lus ni dri ma dang bcas pa'am /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-22: mig dang lag pa dang bral ba'am /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-25: mchu chad pa'am zhes pa la sogs pa yan lag ma tshad ba rnams te /
T02TD1347.2E:164b-26: mtha' dag ni byang chub rgyu ru mchog gi snying rjes shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis bsten par bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-0: slob dpon nam rnal 'byor pa dri ma dag dang rnam par bral te khengs pa la sogs pa'i skyon las grol zhing byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pa chags pa dang phyi rol dang khyim gyi 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba rnams kyis so zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das @165a * //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-2: da ni dang por zhes pa la sogs pas rdo rje'i mchod pa la phyag rgya bzhi'i ming gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-3: 'dir dam tshig 'dus pa la ming rnam pa bzhi ni dang por shes rab bud med gang yin pa de ni gsang ba'i phyag rgyar brjod do //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-4: dam tshig dpal ldan skyes pa ste rnal 'byor pa thabs ni mchog gi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-5: de dag 'dus pa'i rtsed mo la tsumba na la sogs pa ni las kyi phyag rgya zhes brjod do //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-6: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba'i bde mnyam chos kyi phyag rgyar brjod de dam tshig gi skad rnam pa bzhi po 'di ni rdo rje'i mchod pa la gsungs so //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-7: da ni pho nya mo rnams zhes pa la sogs pas pho nya mo rnams kyi lus sam skye gnas la dri'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-8: 'dir pho nya mo rnams dag gi dri lnga lus la gnas pa'am padma gnas par 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-9: de bzhin du de rnams kyi rigs rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-10: de la rang bzhin ni nam mkha' la sogs pa ste de'i yon tan gyi dbang gis gla rtsi'i dri dang padma'i dri dang gci ba'i dri dang nya'i dri dang rang gi dri'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-11: grangs bzhin du dpal ldan bzang mo dang padma can ma dang dung can ma dang sna tshogs ma dang glang chen ma ste 'di rnams gla rtsi la sogs pa'i drir rim pa bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-12: dpal ldan zhes pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-13: dpal ldan shin tu bzang mo'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-14: sgrol ma ni padma can ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-15: gos dkar mo ni dung can ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-16: m'a ma k'i ni sna tshogs ma dang spyan ma ni glang chen ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-17: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa yang rnam pa lnga ste /
T02TD1347.2E:165a-18: seng ge dang ri dags dang rta dang khyu mchog dang glang po che ste rigs kyi dbye ba las so //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-19: mi bskyod pa ni nges ge dang don yod grub pa ni ri dags dang rin chen 'byung ldan ni rta dang snang ba mtha' yas ni khyu mchog dang rnam par snang mdzad ni glang po che'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-20: de'i phyir snga ma bzhin du dri'i nges pa dang rigs kyi nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165a-21: da ni yan lag phra zhes pa la sogs pas lus kyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:165b-0: 'dir shin tu bzang mo ni yan lag phra ldan skra rnams phra zhing rkang lag 'jam la sems can la mnyes gshin @165b zhes pa ste rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-1: de bzhin cung zad phra ba dang ldan la cung zad ring zhing mig ni g-yo ba med la skra ni 'khyog pa padma can zhes pa ste sgrol ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-2: de bzhin du ngo tsha med cing 'dod pa drag la rtsod mang la dga' skra ni shin tu chung bdud can ma zhes pa ste gos dkar mo'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-3: ring zhing yan lag thams cad rdzogs la nges par yang ba'i yul dang skra ni ring ba sna tshogs ma zhes pa ste m'a ma k'i'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-4: de bzhin du sbom zhing thung la yan lag brtan ldan shing tu sra ba'i yul dang skra ni sbom pa glang chen ma zhes pa ste spyan ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-5: de ltar pho nya ma rnams dag pa'i rigs ni 'ga' zhig dag tu 'dir 'gyur dus kun du ni 'dres pa'i rigs so //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-6: pho nya mo sum cu rtsa drug gi rigs nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-7: da ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:165b-8: seng ge dag kyang 'brog na gnas shing yul dang rnam bral 'jigs pa med la gtong ba'i dang tshul can zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-9: ri dags mgyogs 'gro dang ldan 'gyur byed yang ba'i yul dang skrag pa'i sems te shin tu 'jigs pa'o zhes pa ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-10: rta ni nges par 'dod la sred par 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:165b-11: gzhan dbang gci ba'i dri dang gzhan don gnyer ba'o zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-12: khyu mchog rengs pa'i mig dang dman par 'gro ldan rang bzhin yon tan blun po nya yi dri ru 'gyur zhes pa ni snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-13: glang chen 'dod ldan nges par dal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:165b-14: rang gi dri dang shin tu rmongs pa'o zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-15: de ltar 'ga' zhig tu rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis dag pa'i rigs te thams cad du ni 'dres pa'i rigs so //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-16: de ltar sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba sa yi steng gi gnas su rigs kyi dri yi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1347.2E:165b-17: phan tshun 'dres pa las skyes par gyur pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:165b-18: de'i phyir pho nya mo de rnams mchod pa'i don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos yon tan mang po'i gnas ni rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-0: gang las ci'i phyir zhe na shin tu chags par 'gyur pas tshim pa med na rnal 'byor ma rnams rnal 'byor pa @166a * //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-1: la dngos grub ster bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-2: de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi don du 'dod pa'i bstan bcos shes par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-3: da ni bzang mo zhes pa la sogs pas pho nya mo rnams kyi chos kyi khams la sogs pa'i rigs gsungs te 'dir bzang mo ni chos kyi khams ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-4: lha mo ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166a-5: sha za mo ni dri rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166a-6: mi mo ni gzugs rdo rje ma dang srin mo ni ro rdo rje ma dang klu mo ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-7: de la bzang mo sems can phan pa byed ma brtul zhugs nges pa la dga' sdom dang bsam gtan dang tshul can /
T02TD1347.2E:166a-8: lha mo longs spyod la ni rjes chags 'gyur te dri ma ldan zhing lhag ma la chags sha za mo //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-9: mi mo 'dod la rjes su chags ma srin mo mi yi khrag la dga' zhing gsod pa'i sems ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:166a-10: klu mo dag kyang 'o ma'i zas can rab mchog sa yi steng du rnal 'byor pa yis mchod par bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:166a-11: thams cad du gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa rnams su'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-12: de bzhin gzhan pa 'dres pa'i rang bzhin rnams ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis rnal 'byor pa yis rigs par bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:166a-13: tsartsi k'a la sogs pa rnams dang 'dod ma dang phyir 'dod ma la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis sgrub thabs kyi le'u las 'chad par 'gyur pa'i cho gas so //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-14: de ltar sa yi steng gi gnas su mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug dbye bas phye ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-15: da ni chang zhes pa la sogs pas ston pa po'i btung ba'i nges pa gsungs pa 'dir chang thams cad shes rab kyi rang bzhin te /
T02TD1347.2E:166a-16: sbrang rtsi las skyes pa dang bu ram las skyes pa dang 'bras las skyes pa'am shing las skyes pa'am gzhan pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-17: phyag rgya dang bral slob dpon gang zhig 'thung byed de ni yul can du 'gyur te myos par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i don te bdud kyi tshogs kyis bskor bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:166a-18: de phyir shes rab lhag ldan sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing sngags pa rnams la dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-0: phyag rgya gang su rung ba chang 'thung ba'i dus 'dir ni dkyil 'khor dang tshogs @166b kyi 'khor lo med cing dam tshig gi rdzas dang rnam par bral yang btung ba'i slad du rab tu bya ste rdo rje mchod pa'i don du'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-1: gang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dam tshig bzhi po bsten par gyur pa de'i yon tan gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-2: rgyal po ri bong mtshan ma gcig pu 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog byed pa thams cad dus su bsten par bya zhes pa mi 'pho ba'o bde ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-3: shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems kyi khams phyi rol du shor ba zos pas kyang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog na rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci dgos te mi 'pho bar byas pas so zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-4: mi bskyod pa ni gci ba dang don yod grub pa ni rkang dang rgyal ba mchog ni rnam par snang mdzad de de dang ldan pa ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-5: de bzhin du khyi dang rta dang ba lang dang glang po che dang ldan pa dang gzhan yang brgyad pa shin tu drag po ni sha chen te dam tshig rnams ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rdo rje dbyug pa dang skye bo phyugs la 'jigs pa ster ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-6: de ltar bshang pa dang gci ba dang rkang dang sgrol ma lnga ni dam tshig brgyad de gnyis ni nyi ma dang zla ba dag go //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-7: da ltar bdud rtsi lnga dang sgrol ma lngas tshogs kyi 'khor lo la mchod pa rnam pa bcur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-8: chang dang sha dang 'khrig pa dang bdud rtsi za ba zhes pa dam tshig bzhi ni slob dpon gyis bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-9: rnam pa gzhan du na bdud kyi phyogs kyis 'dzin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-10: da ni khyi rta zhes la sogs pas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gzugs yongs su bsgyur pas dam tshig sum cu rtsa drug gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-11: 'dir khyi mo ni sgrol ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-12: rta mo ni gos dkar mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-13: ba lang mo ni m'a ma k'i dang glang chen mo ni spyan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-14: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ni gzugs thams cad 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:166b-15: lug mo ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-16: ra mo ni reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-17: ri dags mo ni ro rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-18: bong mo ni gzugs rdo rje dag phag mo ni dri rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:166b-19: rnga mo ni chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-0: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi @167a * //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-1: dbye bas 'di rnams phyogs zhes pa ste bcu'o //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-2: de bzhin du kum bh'i ra mo ni tsartsi k'a dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-3: 'gron bu mo ni khyab 'jug ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-4: ku l'i ra mo ni phag mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-5: nya mo ni gzhon nu ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-6: ma ka ra mo ni dbang mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-7: sbal mo ni tshangs ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-8: rus sbal mo ni dbang phyug ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-9: dung mo ni dpal chen mo ste 'byung po las skyes pa brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-10: bse ru mo ni shin tu stobs ma dang stag mo ni rmugs byed ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-11: dom mo ni rengs byed ma dang ne le mo ni nga rgyal ma dang 'bri mo ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang ce sbyang mo ni khro gnyer can ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-12: sram mo ni 'od zer can ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-13: phyi la mo ni tsun d'a dang 'brog dgon pa'i khyi mo ni shin tu sngon mo dang 'brog dgon pa'i seng ge mo ni drag spyan ma ste khro bo las skyes pa bcu'o //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-14: de bzhin go dh'a ni khyi gdong ma dang byi ba mo ni phag gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-15: sh'a li dza ta ka ni ce sbyang gdong ma dang spre'u mo ni stag gdong ma dang ri bong mo ni bya rog gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-16: gzugs mo ni bya rgod gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-17: aishu ka ni mkha' lding gdong ma dang rtsangs pa mo ni 'ug gdong ma ste brgyad ni lha min las skyes pa rnams kyi dam tshig dang gzugs yongs su bsgyur pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-18: de ltar sa la spyod pa dang chu la spyod pa'i dam tshig nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-19: da ni kheng ldan zhes pa la sogs pas mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyi dam tshig gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-20: 'dir khyil sogs pa bzhi po ji lta ba de bzhin du khengs ldan 'dab chags te /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-21: khug rta dang ne tsho dang khu byug dang ri skegs te gsal bar chu yi gter zhes pa dam tshig bzhi ste sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-22: de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug ni l'a ba dang phug ron dang bya dkar dang mchil pa dang dur pa dang dang pa'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:167a-23: de bzhin du 'byung po las skyes pa'i dam tshig brgyad ni khrung khrung dang khu byug mig dang srin bya dag dang bha ga ba t'i zhes pa skyung ka dang sreg pa dang bzhad dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167a-24: chu la 'jug pa zhes pa chu'i bya rog dang chu skyar te nor rnams zhes pa brgyad ni ts'a mundala sogs pa rnams kyi ste rim pas rig par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:167b-0: de bzhin du khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi dam tshig bcu ni bya rog dang bya rgod dang @167b 'ug pa dang ri dags dgra zhes pa hor pa chen po dang gtsug phud can dang bya gag dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-1: bhe dra zhes pa san tsa ka dang gh'a ra zhes pa'o la ba dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-2: hor pa dang ljon shing dgra ste khro bo las skyes khro bo'i rigs rmugs byed la sogs pa rim pa ji lta bas so //
T02TD1347.2E:167b-3: de bzhin du khyi gdong ma la sogs pa lha min rnams kyi dam tshig brgyad ni mig sngon dang tsa ko ra dang aa ni la dang gu da mu kha zhes pa pha bang dang bug ki zhes pa d'a da p'u ha dang rkang ste nyal zhes pa lcog dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-4: bhe runda dang aam pa ri ka ste mi yi bdag po bya rog gdong ma la sogs pa lha min mo rnams kyi mchog gi 'dab chags brgyad du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:167b-5: de ltar sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye bas sa yi srid pa la gnas sa spyod mkha' la spyod rnams kyi rigs su gyur pa'i dam tshig ste dam tshig bdun cu rtsa gnyis po mtha' dag rnams ni mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas bza' bar bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:167b-6: de rnams kyang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis byin te rmongs pas gti mug dag las gal te tshogs kyi 'khor lo la dam tshig byin pa rnams spangs na de'i tshe myur du nyams par rab tu 'gyur te smad pa'i sems kyis so //
T02TD1347.2E:167b-7: da ni so dang zhes pa la sogs pas lus kyi cha shas kyi dam tshig gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-8: so dang skra dang pags pa dang sha dang chu rgyus dang rus pa dang snying dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-9: padma zhes pa skye gnas dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-11: srin bu dang glo ba dang rgyu ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-12: chu so dang bad kan dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-13: mkhris pa dang chu dang rnag dang khrag dang rdul dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-16: dri chu dang chu ser dang zhag dang bshang ba rnams te /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-17: sna tshogs lus la gnas pa zhes pa sems can rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i kha dog sna tshogs dang dri sna tshogs dang /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-18: lce dang mig dang rna ba dang sna dang ri bong can zhes pa khu ba dang nyin byed ces pa rdul te dam tshig gi rdzas 'di rnams kyis lha rnams mchod par bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:167b-19: tshogs kyi 'khor lo la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-0: su cu rtsa drug yi ge rnams ni de dag gi rang gi rang bzhin yon tan dbang @168a * //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-1: gis zhes pa nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams kyi dbang gis te /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-8: ha ya ra wa la ksha zhes pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-9: 'di rnams ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang ste bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa sum cu rtsa bdun no //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-10: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa drug khams kyi dbye ba ste aa a'a ai a'i ri r'i au a'u li l'i aom aa:aa a'a ae aee aa ra a'a ra ao aoo aa la a'a la ao aa:ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la l'a ho ha:zhes pa sum cu rtsa drug ste /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-11: 'di rnams ni mtha' dag srid pa la gnas rigs rnams dang mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug dang phyag rgya sum cu rtsa drug go //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-12: de bzhin du dbyangs dang bcas pa'i yi ge so sos bskyed pa rnams ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud sum cu rtsa drug go //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-13: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma'i rigs kyi rgyud rnams te ;
T02TD1347.2E:168a-14: bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa thams cad sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bdag nyid du rig par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-15: zhes pa ni sa gzhi dag la gnas pa rnams zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-16: lhag ma rnams ni dag pa'i rigs su mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-17: gsal byed sna tshogs kyi chos can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-18: de ltar rigs sum cu rtsa drug gi dkyil 'khor bri ba dang rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod pa ni nya so so la bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-19: da ni chu dang zhes pa la sogs pas 'khor lo 'dus pa la mchod yon la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-20: chu'i snod dang mchod yon gyi snod dang dri'i snod dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-21: spos kyi snod dang me tog gi snod dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-22: 'bras bu'i snod dang 'bru ma nyams pa'i snod dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-23: mar me'i snod dang lha bshos kyi snod dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-24: gos kyi snod de de ltar mchod pa'i rdzas rnam pa bcu ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la 'dus pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168a-25: de bzhin du nang gi rdzas rnam pa bcur 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-26: khu ba dang gci ba dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-27: rkang dang bshang ba dang sha dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168a-28: mchin pa dang mkhris pa dang khrag dang rgyu ma dang pags pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-0: rnam pa bcu ni 'khor lo 'dus pa @168b la lha mo rnams mchod pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-1: rgyal po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-2: da ni sgrol ma la sogs pa'i rigs las sgyes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-3: 'dir tshogs kyi 'khor lo la zhugs pa rnams sam /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-4: grong ngam grong khyer du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dpral ba'am phrag pa gnyi ga'am g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i dpyi'i phyogs la gang gi tshe lus kyi kha dog las gang zhig kha dog gzhan dang gzhan du rtogs par 'gyur pa'i mtshan ma de ni kha dog las rig par bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-5: gang yang lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil du 'gyur pa de ni ri mo rnams kyis rig par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-6: des na rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi lag pa gzung ba'i slad du bud med dang skyes pa'i mtshan nyid bslab par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-7: gang gis gzhan gyi bud med kyis rang gi lag pa yang mtshan yid kyi don du gtong du 'jug par byed na des zol gyis de rnams kyi lus la gnas pa dang lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil na gnas pa dang khyim du bris pa'i mtshan ma rig par bya'o zhes pa ni thabs so //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-8: de la gang gi skye ba'i gnas lnga rnams su kha dog las rdo rje mthong na de ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-9: lag pa'i mthil lam rkang pa'i dag la ni ri mo rnams kyis so //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-10: de bas na de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi rigs can ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-11: de bzhin du sgrol ma'i ral gri dang gos dkar mo'i mnga' 'am rin po che dang m'a ma k'i'i padma 'dab ma brgya pa dang spyan ma'i lnga pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-12: de ltar rlung dang me dang chu dang sa'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:168b-13: de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma'i rgyud mangs dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-14: gzugs rdo rje ma'i me long dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-15: ro rdo rje ma'i snod dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-16: dri rdo rje ma'i me tog phreng ba dang /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-17: reg bya rdo rje ma'i gos dang ;
T02TD1347.2E:168b-18: chos khams rdo rje ma'i chos 'byung ste /
T02TD1347.2E:168b-19: yul gyi rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas lnga rnams sam lag pa dang rkang pa rnams la mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169a-0: de bzhin du nges par gri gug la sogs pa rnam pa brgyad @169a * //
T02TD1347.2E:169a-1: de de la tsartsi k'a'i gri gug dang khyab 'jug ma'i dum pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-2: phag mo'i bcu gzar dang gzhon nu ma'i gos ser po dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-3: dbang mo'i khab bam tho ba dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-4: tshangs ma'i nya rgya dang drag mo'i rtse gsum dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-5: dpal mo'i rdo gru bzhi ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-6: mtshan ma brgyad po 'di ni 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi zhes pa 'chi med la sogs pa'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169a-7: de bzhin du khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi bcu ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-8: de las rmugs byed ma'i smug rtsi'i snod de nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs pa zlum po dang rengs byed ma'i dar gyi srin bu dang nga rgyal can ma'i ku sha dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-9: shin tu stobs ma'i chu gri dang 'od zer can ma'i mthil lha ma dang tsun d'a'i spu gri dang khro gnyer can ma'i shing lha ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-10: rdo rje'i lcags sgrog ma'i gdugs dang drag spyan ma'i tog tse dang shin tu sngon mo'i 'od ma'i dbyug pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-11: de ltar bcu ni khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur zhing rnam gnyis las kyi dbang po rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169a-12: de bzhin du lha min rnams kyi mtshan ma ni khyi gdong ma'i ba lang gi rva dang phag gdong ma'i kham por zhes pa sa'i phor pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-13: ci sbyang gdong ma'i rgyud ldan dang stag gdong ma'i 'phang dang bya rog gdong ma'i sha'i gsal shing dang bya rgod gdong ma'i rgyud mangs nye ba'i yan lag ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-14: mi'am ci mo dang mkha' lding gdong ma'i mda' dang 'ug gdong ma'i rma bya'i mjug ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-15: mtshan ma brgyad po 'di ni kha la sogs pa sgro brgyad rnam par dag pas rigs brgyad po rnams la mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:169a-16: de ltar mtshan ma sum cu rtsa drug gang la mthong ba de rnams ni de'i rigs can te mtshan ma nges shes nas mchod par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169a-17: slar yang ste yang sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams kyi dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:169a-18: 'dir dmangs rigs kyi yon tan gyi dbang gis sgrol ma'i rigs las skyes pa rnams kyi autpala 'am thong gshol ma thong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:169a-19: rgyal rigs ma ste gos dkar mo'i rigs las skyes pa'i rin chen patta'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-0: rje rigs @169b ma ste spyan ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i smyu gu dang rin chen phreng ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-1: gnyis skyes ma ste m'a ma k'i'i rigs las skyes pa'i chu na rgyu ba dung dang zangs snod do //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-2: de bzhin du snga ma dang phyi mar yum gyi mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-3: g-yung mo rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i da ma ru dang rda chen no //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-4: de bzhin du gtum mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i cod pan dang bgrang phreng ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-5: de ltar rang gi dbral ba'am phrag pa'am dbyi dang lag pa'am rkang pa rnams la mtshan ma gang zhig mthong ba'am khyim du bris shing mchod pa byed pa de ni de'i rigs can du rnal 'byor pas rigs par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-6: des gang byin pa'i dam tshig gi rdzas de bza' bar bya zhing ji srid lan bdun du 'khor ba'i mthar thug pa de bsten par bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-7: dam tshig gi rdzas des mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-8: da ni bshad pa la sogs pa dam tshig gi rdzas rnams las la sogs pa'i lha'i rnam par dag pa gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-9: 'dir bshang ba dang gci ba dang khrag dang bcas pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-10: sha dang bcas pa ni grangs bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung gi lha rnams kyi bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-11: ma smos kyang khu ba ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes pa nam mkha'i khams so //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-12: de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-13: bha ga ni sgra dang dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya dang chos kyi khams kyi lha mo rnams kyi dam tshig drug ste sgra yi rdo rje la sogs drug ces so //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-14: de bzhin du rang dang bad kan dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-15: shig dang srin bu dang chu ser dang zhag dang ba spu rnams dang skra rnams zhes pa dam tshig brgyad ni grangs bzhin du tsartsi k'a dang khyab 'jug ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-16: phag mo dang gzhon nu ma dang dbang mo dang tshangs ma dang drag mo dang dpal chen mo ste /
T02TD1347.2E:169b-17: rnal 'byor ma 'byung po las skyes pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:169b-18: de bzhin du rgyu ma dang mkhris pa dang rus pa dang rkang dang sna tshogs lus la gnas pa zhes pa sems can thams cad kyi lus la gnas pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-1: dang glo ba dang rtsa dang pags pa dang snying dang tshil bu ste de ltar bcur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-2: rgyu ma la sogs pa'i tshul bu'i mthar thug pa ni grangs bzhin du rmugs byed ma dang rengs byed ma dang nga rgyal can ma dang shin tu stobs ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-3: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang khro gnyer can dang tsun d'a dang 'od zer can dang drag spyan ma dang shin tu sngon mo ste /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-4: khro bo'i lha mo 'di rnams kyi dam tshig bcu'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-5: de bzhin du rna ba'i dri ma dang sna'i dri ma dang mig gi dri ma dang lce'i dri ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-6: bshang lam gyi dri ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-9: mchan khung gi dri ma ste lus thams cad kyi dri ma rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-10: dam tshig brgyad ni lha min mo rnams kyi grangs bzhin du ste /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-11: khyi gdong ma dang phag gdong ma dang ce sbyang gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-14: bya rgod gdong ma dang mkha' lding gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-15: 'ug gdong ma ste 'di rnams kyi dam tshig brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-16: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma rnams ni 'jigs ma la sogs pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-17: gang zhig brgyad pa brgyad de drug cu rtsa bzhi po de rnams kyi dam tshig ni sen mo nyi shu dang so sum cu rtsa gnyis dang rtsa rgyu ba'i dbye bas thod pa dum bu bcu gnyis rnams te dam tshig drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-18: de bzhin du rigs brgya'i dbye bas dam tshig brgya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-19: rigs gsum dang ni rigs lnga nyid //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-20: rang bzhin gcig ste rigs brgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-22: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs sum cu rtsa drug dang rigs drug cu rtsa bzhi gcig nyid rigs brgyar rig par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-23: da ni gnas la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi rnam par dag pa gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:170a-24: bshad pa dang gci ba dang khrag dang sha zhes pa sna tshogs mtha' dag sems can rnams kyi lus la gnas pa rnams ni gnas kyi dbye ba dag la bzhi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-25: rna ba dang sna dang mig dang lce dang bshang lam dang bha ga zhes pa drug ni zhing gi dbye ba la 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:170a-26: de bzhin du rang dang bad kan dang shig dang srin bu dang /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-0: chu ser dang @170b zhag dang ba spu dang skra ste brgyad ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-1: de bzhin du rgyu ma dang mkhris pa dang rus pa dang rkang dang mchin pa dang glo ba dang rtsa dang pags pa dang snying dang tshil bu ste bcu ni 'dus pa'i dbye ba rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-2: de bzhin du rna ba'i dri ma dang sna'i dri ma dang mig gi dri ma dang lce'i dri ma dang bha ga'i dri ma dang bshang lam gyi dri ma dang rtags kyi dri ma dang mchan khung gi dri ma ste yan lag brgyad kyi dri ma 'di brgyad ni dur khrod kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-3: de bzhin du phyi rol du 'jig rten gyi khams la gnas la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pas dam tshig rnams gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-4: 'dir dus me dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan ni gnas kyi dbye bas spyan ma la sogs pa rnams kyi dam tshig bzhi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-5: sa skyes dang zla skyes dang sngags pa dang pa sngags dang spen pa dang gdengs can zhes pa mjug rings te /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-6: 'di rnams ni zhing gi dbye bas gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i dam tshig rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-7: de bzhin du sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang sa las skyes pa dang chu las skyes pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-8: me las skyes pa dang rlung las skyes pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-9: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i 'byung ba brgyad po rnams ni tshan do ha yi dbye ba rnams te ;
T02TD1347.2E:170b-10: 'byung po las skyes pa rnams kyi dam tshig go //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-11: slar yang de nas ro drug po rnams dang dri dang kha dog dang sgra dang reg bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-12: bcu ni 'dus pa'i dbye ba rnams te khro bo las skyes pa rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-13: sa la sogs pa rnams dang kha dog la sogs pa bzhi po rnams dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa dag gis zad pa ni dur khrod kyi rab tu dbye ba rnams te /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-14: lha min mo rnams kyi dam tshig brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-15: gnas la sogs pa phyi nang gi dam tshig rnam par dag pa'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-16: da ni gnas zhes pa la sogs pas nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i gnas rnams gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:170b-17: 'dir thun mong gis byis pa rnams yul du 'khyam pa'i don du dz'a lam dha ra la sogs pa rnams gnas la sogs par gsungs so //
T02TD1347.2E:170b-18: de nyid ni thams cad du khyab par byed par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-0: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs sum cu rtsa @171a * //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-1: drug ni grong khyer gcig tu'ang gnas so //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-2: gang gis na 'dir sa gzhi thams cad du khyab par dam pa dang po'i rgyud du gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-3: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas sa thams cad la khyab par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-4: bod la sogs pa dang rgya nag la sogs pa'i yul rnams na yang gnas la sogs pa yod do //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-5: de nyid ni bsdus pa'i rgyud gzhan du ma bstan to //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-6: yul thams cad dang grong thams cad du gnas la sogs pa gsungs pa ni gnas ni sgrol ma la sogs khyim ste rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-7: de bzhin du sgra rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i khyim ni zhing rnam pa drug go //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-8: tsartsi k'a la sogs pa'i khyim ni tshan do ha rnam pa brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-9: rmugs byed ma la sogs pa'i khyim ni 'dus pa rnam pa bcu'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-10: khyi gdong ma la sogs pa'i khyim ni dur khrod rnam pa brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-11: mchog gi sar gnas rtsa ba'i gnas dang gsang bar bcas pa ni yum gyi khyim rnam pa gnyis te /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-12: de dag rab tu gsal bar sa la mthar skyes ma dang mthar skyes ma zhes pa g-yung mo dang gtum mo'i khyim ste /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-13: de ltar dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i khyim ni gnas la sogs pa'i ming gis rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-14: da ni gnas zhes pa la sogs pas nang du gnas la sogs pa'i ming gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-15: 'dir dam tshig 'dus pa la gnas ni thams cad du bud med kyi padma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-16: nye ba'i rnams kyi sgras skyes pa'i rdo rjer 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-17: de bzhin du bud med rnams kyi skye mched drug ni zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-18: skyes pa rnams kyi ni nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-19: de bzhin du bud med rnams kyi mnyam gnas la sogs pa'i rlung brgyad ni tshang do ha'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-20: skyes pa rnams kyi ni nye ba'i tshan do ha'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171a-21: de bzhin du bud med rnams kyi lce dang lce chung dang lag pa gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis dang /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-22: bshang lam gyi g-yas dang g-yon gyi rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-23: gci ba dang khu ba'i rtsa gnyis te /
T02TD1347.2E:171a-24: las kyi dbang po bcu po 'di rnams ni 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-0: skyes pa @171b rnams kyi ni nye ba'i 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-1: sna gnyis dang rna ba gnyis dang mig gnyis dang /
T02TD1347.2E:171b-2: kha dang bshang lam las dri ma 'byung ba ste /
T02TD1347.2E:171b-3: de ltar bud med rnams kyi dur khrod brgyad do //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-4: skyes pa rnams kyi ni nye ba'i dur khrod do zhes pa ste mtha' dag go //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-5: de bzhin du gnyi ga'i lus la so sor gnas ni g-yon gyi yan lag dang mdun no //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-6: nye ba'i gnas ni rgyab dang g-yas kyi yan lag ste /
T02TD1347.2E:171b-7: de ltar gnas rnam pa gnyis so //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-8: de bzhin du g-yon gyi dbang po'i tshogs ni zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-9: g-yas kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-10: de bzhin du rus sbal dang rtsangs pa dang lha sbyin dang nor las rgyal ba ste bzhi ni tshang do ha'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-11: mnyam gnas dang gyen rgyu dang khyab byed dang klu'i tshogs ni nye ba'i tshan do ha'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-12: de bzhin du g-yon gyi las kyi dbang po'i tshogs ni 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-13: g-yas kyi ni nye ba'i 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-14: g-yon gyi rna ba la sogs pa'i bug pa dri ma 'byung ba ni dur khrod do //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-15: g-yas kyi ni nye ba'i dur khrod do //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-16: de bzhin du lag pa dang rkang pa la sogs par gtogs pa'i rnam par dag pa gzhan gyis te /
T02TD1347.2E:171b-17: mdun dang g-yon gyi yan lag ni gnas so //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-18: rgyab dang g-yas kyi ni nye ba'i gnas so //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-19: de bzhin du g-yon gyi dpung pa'i tshigs dang g-yon gyi bral dang dpyi'i tshogs ni zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-20: g-yas kyi ni nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-21: g-yon gyi nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs dang byin pa dang brla'i tshigs ni tshan do ha'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-22: g-yas kyi ni nye ba'i tshan do ha'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-23: de bzhin du g-yon gyi lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs gnyis ni 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-24: g-yas kyi ni nye ba'i 'dus pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-25: de bzhin du g-yon gyi ser mo dang sen mo rnams ni dur khrod ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-26: g-yas kyi ni nye ba'i dur khrod do //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-27: yang na gnyi ga'i dpung pa'i tshigs gnyis ni zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-28: brla'i tshigs gnyis ni nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:171b-29: de bzhin du tshan do ha la sogs pa yang ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-0: lag pa dang rkang pa la gnas pa yang sor mo'i mtha'i mtshams su'o zhes pa dam tshig 'dus pa la gnas la sogs pa'i ming rnal 'byor pas @172a * //
T02TD1347.2E:172a-2: da ni dran pa zhes pa la sogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-3: 'dir lha mo bzhi ni rim pa bzhin du ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-4: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni spyan ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-5: tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni gos dkar mo'o zhes pa rgyab dang g-yas so //
T02TD1347.2E:172a-6: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni m'a ma k'i dang chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni sgrol ma'o zhes pa g-yon dang mdun te /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-7: lus kyi dbye bas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas gnyis so //
T02TD1347.2E:172a-8: dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags zhes pa rgyud gzhan du rab tu ma grags te /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis spas so zhes pa'i don to //
T02TD1347.2E:172a-10: de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi nang nas byang chub kyi yan lag gcig ni yum rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-11: rigs kyi gnas btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02TD1347.2E:172a-12: gzhan pa rnams kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug ces pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-13: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-14: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni reg bya rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-15: brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gzugs rdo rje ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-16: lus kyi dbye bas nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:172a-17: de bzhin du dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dri rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-18: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-19: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-21: de bzhin du chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang zhes pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-22: sdig pa ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir spong ba ni tsartsi k'a dang sdig pa skyes pa rnams spong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni khyab 'jug ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-23: mi dge ba ma skyes pa rnams spong ba'i dge ba bskyed pa ni dbang phyug ma dang dge ba skyes pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su bsngo bas spong ba ni dpal chen mo ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172a-24: nye ba'i tshan do ha bzhi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:172a-25: gzhan pa chu gter lha mo bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-0: de la 'dun pa'i @172b rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni tshangs ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-1: brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni dbang mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-2: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni phag mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-3: dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gzhon nu ma'o zhes pa tshan do ha'i dbye ba ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-5: de bzhin du khro mo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-6: 'dir dad pa'i stobs ni shin tu sngon mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-7: brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni shin tu stobs ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-8: dran pa'i stobs ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni nga rgyal ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-10: shes rab kyi stobs ni tsun d'a ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-12: de bzhin du rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do zhes pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-13: de bzhin du dad pa'i dbang po ni rengs byed ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-14: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni rmugs byed ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-15: dran pa'i dbang po ni 'od zer can dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni khro gnyer can dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-17: shes rab kyi dbang po ni drag spyan ma'o zhes pa 'dus pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-19: yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du 'gyur zhes pa la 'dir yang dag pa'i lta ba ni khyi gdong ma dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa ni bya rog gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-20: yang dag pa'i ngag ni stag gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-21: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni 'ug gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-22: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni ce sbyang gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-23: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni mkha' lding gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-24: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma dang /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-25: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bya rgod gdong ma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-26: de ltar na sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de rnams mtha' dag rnal 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal 'byor ba yis rig par bya ste g-yung mo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:172b-27: de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rnam par sbyangs pa'i gnas la sogs pa ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:172b-28: mi yi bdag po phyi dang lus la yang de bzhin zhes pa thams cad du nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-0: @173a * // da ni sangs rgyas pa zhes pa la sogs pas 'di rnams bsten pa'i slad du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi spyod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-1: 'dir rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur ba ste mu stegs pa rnams kyi lha dang /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-3: drag po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-4: tsartsi k'a la sogs pa rnam par sbyangs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la yang sgrub pa po'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-5: des na rnal 'byor pa de nyid thob pa ste dbang bskur ba ni ye shes sam /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-6: 'jig rten pa'i las rab 'byam bsgrub pa'i don du sangs rgyas par gyur kyang rung zhi ba pa'am /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-7: gcer bu pa dad pa mchog tu gyur pa'am /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-8: skal ldan nam gtsang gnas sam /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-9: de bzhin du bram ze'am thod pa can nam skra 'bral zhes pa zad byed par gyur kyang rung gos dkar pa'am zhing skyong du gyur kyang rung ste dag pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-10: thub pa'am bsnyon ba'i gzugs can nam rig pa can nam sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas pa'am /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-11: slob gnyer pa yang rung ste rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag yon tan gter te mi yi dbang //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-12: yid la gang 'dod pa'i spyod pa de ji srid grub par gyur gyi bar du spas te bya zhing /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-13: de nas nus pa las 'jig rten las 'das pa mngon du bya'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-14: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od las rab tu gnas pa dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste lnga pa'o /
T02TD1347.2E:173a-16: // / phyag gi phyag rgya lnga stangs kyis //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-17: gang gis lha min dbang skrag mdzad //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-18: dus kyi 'khor lo der btud nas //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-19: phyag rgya la sogs mtshan nyid bshad //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-20: smra mkhas kyis ni bsdus rgyud kyis //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-21: ji ltar rgyud chen las byung ba //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-22: phyag rgya lta stangs yan lag brnga //
T02TD1347.2E:173a-23: thams cad 'grel pas rgyas par bya /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-0: 'dir phyag rgya bcing ba'i don du rgan @173b po mthe bo la sogs pa sor mo rnams kyi ming ste rgan po ni mthe bo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-1: de nas gnyis pa ni mdzub mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-2: gsum pa ni gung mo dang bzhi pa ni ming med do //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-3: ming med de'i mthar mthe chung ni mtha' dag yon tan gter te nam mkha'i khams nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-4: rnal 'byor pa yis slob dpon gyi man ngag gis rig par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-5: de ltar phyag rgya bcing ba'i don du ming gi dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis zhes pa ni dri dang /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-9: sgra'i yon tan gyi dbang gis de rim pas so //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-10: de bzhin du bcing ba brjod par gyur na rdo rje bcing bzhes par 'gyur zhing nges pa las khu tshur bcing ba byas par gyur na rdo rje'i khu tshur bcing ba zhes pa nges pa ste de bzhin du zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-11: da ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-12: 'dir lag pa gnyi gas rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-13: khu tshur gyis mthe bo bsdams pa dag brla g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i steng du rdo rje'i 'dug stangs la gnas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-14: da ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-15: sngar skyil krung byas nas skyil krung de la lag pa g-yon pa gan rkyal du 'gyur te g-yas pa pus mo g-yas pa'i phyogs nas ji srid sa la reg pa'i bar du sal son par gyur pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-16: de ltar sa la reg pa mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-17: slar yang rim pa de nyid kyis te 'on kyang lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal ni phyag na rin chen gyi mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-18: de bzhin du skyil krung la lag pa g-yon pa'i steng du lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par gnas pa ni phyag na padma ste /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-19: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:173b-20: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil gan rkyal du skyil krung gi steng du ste /
T02TD1347.2E:173b-21: gzhan pa lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil pus mo g-yas pa'i steng du 'jigs pa med pa rab tu sbyin pa ni phyag na ral gri zhes pa don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-0: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i khu tshur g-yas min gyi khu tshur la @174a * //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-1: ste mdzub mo g-yon pa gang yin pa de slar yang gzhan steng du khu tshur bcings pa la mdzub mo rab tu zhugs pa 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste 'di ni gsal bar snying khar son pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-2: de bzhin du gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g-yon pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-3: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo mthe bo sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur cing /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-4: zlum po g-yon pa'i sen mo 'dus pa la g-yas pa'i sen mo 'dus pa ston pa'i sbyor bas gung mo la sogs pa brkyang ba ming med dang /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-5: mthe chung cung zad steng du'o zhes pa snying ga'i phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-6: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-7: da ni mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-8: 'dir rang gi lus la go cha chen po'i don du lag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa zhes pa ni 'dir /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-9: aa yig la sogs pa dbyangs bcva lnga'i bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-10: lag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med ri bong 'dzin pa cha bcva lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-12: aa ae aar ao aal ha ya ra wa la zhes pa ni dbyangs rnams so //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-13: de bzhin du lag pa g-yas la rdo rje nyi ma dbyangs bcva lnga'i bdag nyid de /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-14: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a a'a la aoo a'a ra aee a'a l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa ni yang dag par gang ba'i nyi ma'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-15: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag yang dag sbyar ba rdo rje 'jigs byed de drag po'i rdo rje khro bo las skyes zhes pa /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-16: hum yig las skyes pa'i rtse mo lnga pa bsgoms nas /
T02TD1347.2E:174a-17: rdo rje de dang 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yan lag thams cad la reg par bya ste cod pan dang bcas zhes pa gtsug tor dang bcas pa'i mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mthar zhes pa rkang pa'i sen mo'i mthar thug pa nyid du'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174a-18: 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal ldan mchog gi phyag rgya ste thams cad srung zhing sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-0: de bzhin du phyag rgya 'dis gang zhig cung zad gzung bar bya ba'i @174b dngos po sa skyes chu skyes kyi dam tshig dang mngal skyes sam /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-2: sogs pa'i sgras rus ba las skyes pa'i dam tshig gam /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-3: de bzhin du du bza' ba dang /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-5: dpa' bo dang bcas te sha dang bcas pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sbyang ba dang rgyas pa dang rab tu 'bar bar bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-6: de bzhin du bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la yang ste lha'i sku la rang gi rkang pa bgrod pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-7: gang gang bya ba nye bar sbyor bar 'gyur pa'i dngos po gang yin pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-8: yon tan dbang gis zhes pa snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa dang dri la sogs pa'i yul gyi dbang gis bya ba de la phyag rgya des reg nas sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-9: sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor gyi don dang /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-10: rkang pa bgrod pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya 'di yis bsnun par bya ste mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-11: da ni khro bo'i mgon po'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-12: 'dir lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa zhes pa la 'dir lag pa g-yas pa dang lag pa g-yon pa'i mkhrig ma steng dang 'og tu rab tu zhugs shing dpung pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-13: nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs kyi steng du rdo rje khu tshur gyis gnas pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-14: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa yang rdo rje bcings pas te /
T02TD1347.2E:174b-15: nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur zhes pa rdo rje shugs kyi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-16: de bzhin du mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing zhes pa ni 'dir mdzub mo dag phan tshun du lcags kyu bcings shing mtha' zhes pa mthe chung gnyis po dag bcings te lag pa'i rgyab sbyar bas khu tshur bcings la mthe bo dag khu tshur gyi nang du'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-17: de ltar gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i zhes pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i ste snying khar gnas pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-18: mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
T02TD1347.2E:174b-19: de bzhin du klu rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lag pa dag gis rdo re bcings pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-0: 'dir g-yon pa'i dpung pa dag nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshogs kyi @175a * //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-1: steng du g-yas pa'i dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs bcings pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-2: lag pa g-yon pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs lag pa g-yas pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs kyi steng du ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-3: lag pa g-yon pa dang g-yas pa g-yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa dag go //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-4: de ltar g-yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-5: de ltar g-yas su bskor bas kyang rig par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-6: da ni mthe bo zhes pa la sogs pas mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-7: 'dir rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya la lag pa sbyar ba byas nas mthe bo dag sbyar zhing mthe chung gnyis sbyar la de dag padma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs la gung mo gnyis mnyam par dbus su brkyang ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-8: mdzub mo gnyis gung mo dag gi rgyab kyi char phyed 'khyog pa zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-9: ming med 'og tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa de ltar phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par bya ba'o zhes pas te /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-10: sngar gsungs pa'i mchog gi phyag rgya yang 'di'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-11: de bzhin du rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams te lag pa gnyi ga la gnas mthe bo la sogs mtha' dag rnams zhes pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzhan te shes rab la 'khyud pa'i don du'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-12: de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje bcings pa snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis rdo rer 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-13: g-yas pa steng du byas shing g-yon pa gang yin pa 'og tu khu tshur gyis dril bur 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-14: de bzhin du khu tshur phyed pa ming med dang mthe chung gi khu tshur gyi nang du mthe bo'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-15: de ltar khu tshur phyed par mdzub mo dang ni gung mo sbyar ba mda' dang mtshungs pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur zhes pa steng du ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175a-16: de bzhin du mthe bo khu tshur phyed pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-17: mdzub mo la sogs zhes pa mdzub mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-19: ming med rtse gsum gyi rnam pa slar yang bkram pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175a-20: thams cad du yul gyi don la bdun pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-0: @175b de bzhin du dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur bcings shing mthe chung zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa gdul dka' rnams 'jigs par byed par 'gyur zhes pa gri gug gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-1: de bzhin du rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings shing gung mo'i steng du mthe bo dang 'og tu mdzub mo ste mda' yi mchog gi phyag rgya la zhes pa ni mda'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-2: lcags kyu la rdo rje khu tshur bcings shing mdzub mo khu tshur gyi steng du lcags kyu'i rnam par shin tu 'khyog po ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-3: de bzhin du mthe cung dang mthe bo dag gis khu tshur dang ;
T02TD1347.2E:175b-5: ming med 'og tu mda' dang mtshungs par sbyar zhing de dag gi steng du gung mo ni mdung las te /
T02TD1347.2E:175b-6: de ltar mdung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-7: de bzhin du thad kar khu tshur dang dpung pa rab tu brkyang ba dbyug pa la ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175b-8: de ltar dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-9: de bzhin du lag mthil shin tu mnyam la steng du mthe bo rab tu brkyang zhing thad ka'i char mdzub mo la sogs pa bzhi sbyar ba ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175b-10: de ltar dgra sta'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-11: de bzhin du steng du khu tshur gnyis dang khu tshur gnyis kyi steng du yang mdzub mor 'gyur te lha min bdag po glang chen ni log 'dren te de'i pags pa dag la'o zhes pa glang po che'i pags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-12: de bzhin du mche ba la ni lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe chung zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa g-yas dang g-yas min ni kha la bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1347.2E:175b-13: de ltar mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-14: lag pa g-yas kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang glang po che'i pags pas mche ba'i phyag rgya'i nges pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-15: da ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02TD1347.2E:175b-16: de bzhin du khe ta ka la ste phub la dpung pa g-yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i mthil ni steng du son pa mi 'jigs pa'i lag mthil lta bur 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:175b-17: de ltar phub kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:175b-18: de bzhin du kha tv'am ga la khu tshur bug pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-0: @176a * // ming med dang mthe bo rnams sbyar zhing phrag pa'i gnas su mthe chung steng du rab tu brkyang pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-1: de ltar kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-2: de bzhin du thod pa la sor mo bug pa med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu gan rkyal ni thod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-3: de bzhin du gzhu la rab tu brkyang ba'i lag pa gan rkyal khu tshur te /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-5: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi steng du gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po rten pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-6: gnyis kyis dbus su bug pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-7: de ltar rdo rje zhags pa ste 'di ni lag pa gcig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-8: gzhan ni lag pa gnyis kyis cig car gyis te chu lha la sogs pa'i g-yas pa gang du rdo rje lcags kyu ma mthong ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-9: de ltar zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-10: de bzhin du sbyar ba ste 'dus pa'i ser mo lnga po rnams kyi dbus su gung mo byas nas steng du brkyang pa'i phyag ces pa ni rin po che'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-11: lag pa g-yon pa'i padma'i phyag rgyal mthe bo dang mthe chung sbyar te mdzub mo la sogs pa ni phyogs rnams su'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-12: de ltar sor mo rnams rnam par phye ba padma 'dab ma bzhi pa lta bu ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-13: lag pa gnyi ga dag gis padma 'dab ma brgyad par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-15: de bzhin du da ma ru la gung mo dang ming med dag gis khu tshur bcings shing /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-16: mdzub mo lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-17: mthe bo'i sen mo'i steng du mthe chung phyed 'khyog pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-18: de bzhin du tho ba la khu tshur bcings pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-19: 'khor lo la sor mo thams cad rtsibs kyi rnam par rab tu brkyang ba lag pa gcig la ste lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-20: de bzhin du mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag sbyar te mthe bo'i 'og tu mthe chung la sogs pa khu tshur dang /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-21: mthe bo dang mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ba dag dung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176a-22: me long ni mngon du phyogs shing shin tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil g-yon pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176a-23: me long gi phyag rgyal sor mo rnams bug pa med pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-0: de bzhin du mdzub mo dang por byas nas mthe chung gi mthar @176b thug pa ste mthe bo'i steng du mdzub mo 'khyog po zlum po'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-2: gung mo'i steng du ming med do //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-3: ming med kyi steng du mthe chung ngo //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-4: de ltar lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-5: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mgo bo la mthe bo la sogs bzhi po phan tshun sbyar bas gdong dang mtshungs shing 'og tu gdong rnams te mthe chung bskum pa ni mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-6: de bzhin du lag pa dag gis dung gi phyag rgya sbyar ba cod pan du 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-7: steng du mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-8: lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil gyi phyi phyogs sbyar te rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni rna rgyan la ni rna rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-9: de bzhin du lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams ni rim par yongs su bkod cing phan tshun bcings pa mgul pa'i rgyan la ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-10: de ltar mgul rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-11: de bzhin du ske rags la g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dag gi sor mo gsum ni ming med dang /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-14: sor mo rtse mo sbyar zhing mthe chung dang /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-15: mthe bos khu tshur bcings pa ni ske rags kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-16: de bzhin du lag pa gnyi ga'i mthe bo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis sbyar te /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-17: de dag gis zlum skor lta bur byas shing sor mo lhag ma rnams kyis khu tshur bcings pa ni rkang gdub la ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-19: de bzhin du dpung rgyan nam /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-20: gdu bu la mthe bo sbyar ba dang /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-21: mdzub mo sbyar ba zlum skor lta bur 'gyur zhes te bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-22: da ni mthe bo zhes pa la sogs pas rigs kyi phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-23: 'dir rdo rje khu tshur gyi steng du mthe bo bstan pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thun mong du rigs kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-24: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi steng du mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ba ni gsang ba pa ste /
T02TD1347.2E:176b-25: gnod sbyin rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:176b-26: de bzhin du khu tshur bcings pa las gung mo rab tu brkyang ste bstan pa ni dri za rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-0: @177a * // de bzhin du ming med ni gdengs can rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:177a-1: mthe chung bstan pa ni 'byung po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-2: de bzhin nyid du steng du sor mo bzhi po rnams kyis khu tshur bcings te lag pa'i mthil rab tu gsal bar bstan pa ni srin po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-3: khu tshur bcings te bstan pa ni grub pa rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-4: de bzhin du dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs ni lha rnams kyi rigs so //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-5: de bzhin du lag pa'i rgyab kyi mthil ni tshangs pa'i srin po'i'o //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-6: de bzhin du nye ba'i dpung pa dang /
T02TD1347.2E:177a-7: lag pa'i tshigs bstan pa ni ro langs rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur te /
T02TD1347.2E:177a-8: de ltar phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad ni rigs brgyad las skyes pa rnams la lag pa g-yon pas bstan par bya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-9: da ni lag pa zhes pa la sogs pas dud 'gro'i gdong can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02TD1347.2E:177a-11: gnyi ga'i mthil du sor mo lnga po rnams phyed 'khyog pa seng ge'i sder mo'i rnam pas sder mo can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-12: de bzhin du khu tshur bcings pa las lag pa gnyi ga'i khu tshur gyi steng du mdzub mo gnyis po phyed 'khyog pa zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pas mgo bor bstan pa ni rva can rnams kyi'o zhes pa rva can rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-13: de bzhin du lag pa'i mthil gyi rgyab sbyar nas mthe chung gnyis phan tshun bcings shing mdzub mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:177a-15: srin lag gshibs te brkyang nas mthe bo dag gi gdong sbyar ba ni de ltar bya khyung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1347.2E:177a-16: de bzhin du sor mo lnga po rtse mo'i tshigs 'khyog pa bstan pa gdengs can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro ;
T02TD1347.2E:177a-17: / de bzhin du 'bar pa'i phyag rgya la gung mo dang /
T02TD1347.2E:177a-19: mthe chung brkyang ste lag pa gnyi ga'i mdzub mo gnyis po phan tshun mdud de mgo bo'i steng du kha 'og tu bstan nas /
T02TD1347.2E:177b-0: mchog gi lag mthil dag @177b gi rnam pa de nyid kyis te /
